Text: PRINCE CHARMING Onward, Chauncey!
PRINCE CHARMING To the highest room of the tallest tower...
PRINCE CHARMING ...where my princess awaits rescue from her handsome Prince Charming!
GINGERBREAD MAN This is worse than "Love Letters". I hate dinner theater!
PINOCCHIO Me, too.
PRINCE CHARMING Whoa there, Chauncey!
ACTRESS Hark! The brave Prince Charming approacheth.
PRINCE CHARMING Fear not, fair maiden. I shall slay the monster that guards you...
PRINCE CHARMING ...then take my place as rightful king.
OLD LADY What did she say?
AUDIENCE It's Shrek!
AUDIENCE Whoo, Shrek, yeah!
PRINCE CHARMING Prepare, foul beast...
PRINCE CHARMING ...to enter into a world of pain with which you are not familiar!
WAITER Happy birthday to thee Happy birthday to thee
PRINCE CHARMING Do you mind?
GINGERBREAD MAN Do you mind? Boring!
PRINCE CHARMING Prepare, foul beast...
PRINCE CHARMING Someday you'll be sorry.
AUDIENCE We already are!
PRINCE CHARMING Mommy...
PRINCE CHARMING You're right. I can't let this happen.
PRINCE CHARMING I can't!
PRINCE CHARMING I am the rightful King of Far Far Away.
PRINCE CHARMING And I promise you this, Mother...
PRINCE CHARMING ...I will restore dignity to my throne.
PRINCE CHARMING And this time,
PRINCE CHARMING no one will stand in my way.
SHREK Good morning.
FIONA Good morning.
FIONA Morning breath.
SHREK I know. Isn't it wonderful?
DONKEY Good morning, good morning
DONKEY The sun is shining through
DONKEY Good morning, good morning To you
DONKEY And you! And you!
DONKEY They grow up so fast.
SHREK Not fast enough.
PUSS You'll be filling in for the King and Queen.
PUSS Several functions require your attendance, sir.
SHREK Great! Let's get started.
DONKEY Come on, lazybones. Time to get moving!
DONKEY You need to get a pair ofjammies.
SHREK I got some sleep and I needed it
SHREK Not a lot, just a little bit
SHREK Someone's always trying to keep me from it
SHREK It's a crying shame
SHREK It's a royal pain in the neck
SHREK I knight thee.
DONKEY If you're filling in for a king, you should look like one.
DONKEY Can somebody come in and work on Shrek?
RAUL I will see what I can do.
PUSS Yeah, wow.
FIONA Is this really necessary?
RAUL Quite necessary, Fiona.
SHREK - I'm Shrek, you twit.
PUSS This isn't a rehearsal, peoples. Let's see some hustle!
DONKEY Smiles, everyone! Smiles!
SHREK I don't know how much longer I can keep this up.
FIONA I'm sorry, but can you just try to grin and bear it?
FIONA It's just until Dad gets better.
FIONA Shrek?
FIONA You look handsome.
SHREK Come here, you.
SHREK My butt is itching up a storm and I can't reach it in this monkey suit.
SHREK Hey, you! Come here. What's your name?
FIDDLESWORTH Fiddlesworth, sir.
SHREK Perfect.
MASTER OF CEREMONIES Ladies and gentlemen...
MASTER OF CEREMONIES ...Princess Fiona and Sir Shrek!
SHREK Ahh! You've got it.
SHREK A little to the left.
SHREK That's it! That's good.
SHREK Oh, yeah! Scratch that thing! You're on it.
FIONA Shrek!
DONKEY My eye!
WOMAN What are you doing?
SHREK Fiona!
SHREK & FIONA - Are you okay? - Yeah. I'm fine.
DONKEY Shrimp! My favorite!
SHREK & FIONA - That's it! We're leaving! - Calm down.
SHREK Calm down? Who do you think we're kidding? I am an ogre.
SHREK I'm not cut out for this, Fiona, and I never will be.
DONKEY I think that went well.
SHREK Donkey!
DONKEY Come on, Shrek!
PUSS Some people just don't understand boundaries.
FIONA Just think. A couple more days and we'll be back home...
FIONA ...in our vermin-filled shack strewn with fungus...
FIONA ...and filled with the rotting stench of mud and neglect.
SHREK You had me at "vermin-filled".
FIONA And, um... maybe even the pitter-patter of little feet on the floor.
SHREK That's right, the swamp rats will be spawning.
FIONA Uh, no.
FIONA What I'm thinking of is a little bigger than a swamp rat.
SHREK Donkey?
FIONA No, Shrek. What if, theoretically...
FIONA ...they were little ogre feet?
SHREK Honey, let's be rational about this.
SHREK Have you seen a baby lately?
SHREK They just eat and poop, and they cry...
SHREK ...then they cry when they poop and poop when they cry.
SHREK Now, imagine an ogre baby.
SHREK They extra-cry and they extra-poop.
FIONA Shrek, don't you ever think about having a family?
SHREK Right now, you're my family.
SHREK Somebody better be dying.
KING HAROLD I'm dying.
QUEEN Harold?
KING HAROLD Don't forget to pay the gardener, Lillian.
QUEEN Of course, darling.
KING HAROLD Fiona.
FIONA Yes, Daddy?
KING HAROLD I know I made many mistakes with you.
FIONA It's okay.
KING HAROLD But your love for Shrek has...
KING HAROLD ...taught me much.
KING HAROLD My dear boy...
KING HAROLD ...I am proud to call you my son.
SHREK And I'm proud to call you my frog...
SHREK ...King dad-in-law.
KING HAROLD Now there is a matter of business to attend to.
PUSS The Frog King... is dead.
DONKEY Put your hat back on, fool.
KING HAROLD Shrek...
KING HAROLD ...please come hither.
SHREK Yeah, Dad?
KING HAROLD This kingdom needs a new king.
KING HAROLD You and Fiona are next in line for the throne.
SHREK Next in line. You see, Dad, that's why people love you.
SHREK Even on your deathbed, you're still making jokes.
SHREK Come on, Dad. An ogre as king?
SHREK That's not such a good idea.
SHREK There must be somebody else. Anybody!
KING HAROLD Aside from you, there is only one remaining heir.
SHREK Really? Who is he, Dad?
KING HAROLD His name is...
KING HAROLD ...is...
SHREK What's his name?
KING HAROLD ...is...
FIONA Daddy!
KING HAROLD His name is Arthur.
SHREK Arthur?
KING HAROLD I know you'll do...
KING HAROLD ...what's right.
QUEEN Harold?
SHREK Dad? Dad!
SHREK Dad?
DONKEY Do your thing, man.

MUSIC ~ Makes you give in and cry ~

MUSIC ~ Live and let die ~

MUSIC And a regimented wife ~
PRINCE CHARMING What does a prince have to do to get a drink here?
PRINCE CHARMING Ah, Mabel!
PRINCE CHARMING Why they call you an ugly stepsister, I'll never know.
PRINCE CHARMING Where's Doris? Taking the night off?
MABEL She's not welcome here, and neither are you.
MABEL What do you want, Charming?
PRINCE CHARMING Not much. Just a chance at redemption.
PRINCE CHARMING And a Fuzzy Navel.
PRINCE CHARMING And Fuzzy Navels for all my friends!
CAPTAIN HOOKS We're not your friends.
CAPTAIN HOOK You don't belong here.
PRINCE CHARMING You're absolutely right, but, I mean, do any of us?
CYCLOPS Do a number on his face.
PRINCE CHARMING Wait, wait, wait! We are more alike than you think.
PRINCE CHARMING Wicked Witch! The Seven Dwarfs saved Snow White, and what happened?
EVIL QUEEN Oh, what's it to you?
PRINCE CHARMING They left you the unfairest of them all.
PRINCE CHARMING Now here you are, hustling pool to get your next meal.
PRINCE CHARMING How does that feel?
EVIL QUEEN pretty unfair.
PRINCE CHARMING And you!
PRINCE CHARMING Your star puppet abandons the show to go and find his father.
PUPPET MASTER I hate that little wooden puppet.
PRINCE CHARMING And Hook.
PRINCE CHARMING Need I say more?
PRINCE CHARMING - And you, Frumpypigskin! - Rumpelstiltskin.
PRINCE CHARMING Where's that firstborn you were promised?
PRINCE CHARMING Mabel. Remember how you couldn't get your little fat foot...
PRINCE CHARMING ...into that tiny glass slipper?
PRINCE CHARMING Cinderella is in Far Far Away right now...
PRINCE CHARMING ...eating bonbons, cavorting with every last fairy tale creature...
PRINCE CHARMING ...that has ever done you wrong!
PRINCE CHARMING Once upon a time, someone decided that we were the losers.
PRINCE CHARMING But there are two sides to every story...
PRINCE CHARMING ...and our side has not been told!
PRINCE CHARMING So who will join me? Who wants to come out on top for once?
PRINCE CHARMING Who wants their...
PRINCE CHARMING ..."happily ever after"?
BLIND MOUSE This way, gents.
PUSS It's out of my hands, senorita. The winds of fate have blown on my destiny.
PUSS But I will never forget you. You are the love of my life.
PUSS As are you.
PUSS And, uh, you.
PUSS I don't know you, but I'd like to.
PUSS I got to go!
DONKEY I don't wanna leave you either.
DONKEY But you know how Shrek is. The dude's lost without me.
DONKEY But don't worry. I'll send you airmail kisses every day!
DONKEY Be strong, babies.
DONKEY Coco, Peanut, listen to your mama.
DONKEY Bananas, no roasting marshmallows on your sister's head.
DONKEY That's my special boy!
DONKEY Come here, all of you! Give your daddy a big hug!
FIONA Shrek?
FIONA Maybe you should just stay and be King.
SHREK Come on. There's no way I could ever run a kingdom.
SHREK That's why your cousin Arthur is a perfect choice.
FIONA It's not that, no. You see...
SHREK And if he gives me any trouble, I always have persuasion and reason.
SHREK Here's persuasion... and here's reason.
SHREK Fiona...
SHREK ...soon it's just going to be you, me...
SHREK ...and our swamp.
FIONA It's not going to be just you and me.
SHIP CAPTAIN All aboard!
SHREK It will be. I promise.
SHREK I love you.
PIG That's lovely.
DONKEY Bye-bye, babies!
FIONA Shrek!
SHREK - Wait! - What is it?
FIONA I'm... I'm...
SHREK I love you too, honey!
FIONA No! I said I'm...
SHREK You're what?
FIONA I said I'm pregnant!
SHREK What was that?
FIONA You're going to be a father!
SHREK That's great!
FIONA Really? I'm glad you think so!
FIONA I love you!
SHREK Yeah!
SHREK Me, too! You!
DONKEY I'm going to be an uncle! I'm going to be an uncle!
PUSS And you, my friend, are royally...
SHREK Home.
FIONA Shrek!
SHREK Fiona!
SHREK Fiona?
SHREK Oh, no.
SHREK better out than in, I always say.
SHREK No, no, no!
SHREK It's okay. It's gonna be all right.
SHREK Stop! Hey, wait!
SHREK Donkey. Donkey!
DONKEY Wake up!
OGRE BABY Dada!
DONKEY Shrek! You okay?
SHREK I can't believe I'm going to be a father. How did this happen?
PUSS Allow me to explain. You see, when a man has a certain feeling for a woman...
PUSS ...a powerful urge sweeps over him.
SHREK I know how it happened.
SHREK I just can't believe it.
DONKEY How does it happen?

SHREK Donkey! Can you just cut to the part
SHREK where you're supposed to make me feel better?
PUSS You know I love Fiona, boss. Right?
PUSS What I am talking about here is you, me, my cousin's boat...
PUSS ...an ice cold pitcher of mojitos and two weeks of nothing but fishing.
DONKEY Don't listen to him!
DONKEY Having a baby is not going to ruin your life.
SHREK It's not my life I'm worried about ruining, it's the kid's.
SHREK I mean, when have you ever heard the phrase "as sweet as an ogre"...
SHREK ...or "as nurturing as an ogre"...
SHREK ...or how about "You're gonna love my dad. He's a real ogre."
DONKEY Okay. Okay. I get it.
DONKEY But nobody said it's going to be easy. But at least you got us to help you.
SHREK That's true.
SHREK I'm doomed.
DONKEY You'll be fine.
SHIP CAPTAIN You're finished.
SHIP CAPTAIN Uh, with your journey.
DONKEY "Wor-ces-ters-shiree"? Now that sounds fancy!
SHREK It's Worcestershire.
DONKEY Like the sauce? Hmmmmmm!
DONKEY It's spicy!
DONKEY Oh, they must be expecting us.
DONKEY What in the shista-shire kind of place is this?
SHREK Well, my stomach aches and my palms just got sweaty. Must be a high school.
DONKEY High school?
CHEERLEADERS Ready? Okay!
CHEERLEADERS Wherefore art thou headed, to the top?
CHEERLEADERS Yeah, we think so, we think so! And dost thou thinkest thine can be stopped?
CHEERLEADERS Nay, we thinkst not, we thinkst not!
DRIVERS ED INSTRUCTOR All right, Mr. Percival, ease up on the reins.
VAN STUDENT For lo, bro, don't burn all my frankincense and myrrh.
DONKEY I'm feeling nauseous from memories of wedgies and swirlies!
PUSS How did you receive wedgies when you are clearly not the wearer of the underpants?
DONKEY Let's just say some things are better left unsaid.
GUINEVERRE So I was all like, "I'd rather get the black plague than go out with you."
TIFFANY - Oh, totally. - Pardon me.
TIFFANY - Totally ew-eth. - Yeah, totally.
GARY I just altered my character level to +3 superb-ability.
SHREK Hi. We're looking for someone named...
GARY Who rolled a +9 dork spell and summoned the beast and his quadruped?
SHREK I know you're busy not fiting in, but can either of you tell me where I can find Arthur?
GARY He's over there.
LANCELOT There is no sweeter taste on thy tongue than victory!
SHREK Strong, handsome, face of a leader.
SHREK Does Arthur look like a king or what?
SHREK Sorry.

PUSS That information is on a need-to-know basis.
DONKEY It's top secret!
LANCELOT Now, gentlemen, let's away. To the showers!
SHREK Greetings, Your Majesty.
SHREK This is your lucky day.
LANCELOT What are you supposed to be?
LANCELOT Some kind of giant mutant leprechaun or something?
SHREK Giant mutant... You made a funny.
LANCELOT Unhand me, monster!
SHREK Stop squirming, Arthur.
LANCELOT I'm not Arthur.
LANCELOT I am Lancelot.
LANCELOT That dork over there is Arthur.
GUINEVERRE This is, like, totally embarrassing...
GUINEVERRE ...but Tiffany thinkest thou vex her so soothly.
GUINEVERRE She thought perchance thou would ask her to the Homecoming Dance.
SHREK Excuse me?
GUINEVERRE Like, whatever. She's totally into college guys and mythical creatures.
SHREK Oh, Arthur...
SHREK ...come out, come out, wherever you are!
DONKEY You better run, you little punk no-goodniks!
DONKEY The days of Donkey Dumpy Drawers are over!
HALL MONITOR Hold it.
COSTUME STUDENT We're here for the mascot contest.
SHREK We're here for the mascot contest, too.
HALL MONITOR This is a costume?
SHREK Worked on it all night long.
HALL MONITOR Looks pretty real to me.
PUSS If he were real, could I do this?
DONKEY Or this?
SHREK If it were real, that would have been agonizingly painful.
DONKEY & SHREK - Now watch this! - That's quite enough, boys.
PRINCIPAL PYNCHLEY Thank you to Professor Primbotom and his lecture...
PRINCIPAL PYNCHLEY ...on "just say nay".
PRINCIPAL PYNCHLEY And now, without further ado, let's give a warm Worcestershire hoozah...
PRINCIPAL PYNCHLEY ...to the winner of our mascot contest, the...
PRINCIPAL PYNCHLEY ...ogre?
SHREK That's right. I'm the new mascot.
SHREK So let's really try and beat the other guys at...
SHREK ...whatever it is they're doing!
PRINCIPAL PYNCHLEY This is all a bit unorthodox...
SHREK Where can I find Arthur Pendragon?
SHREK Hey, wait...
LANCELOT Classic.
DONKEY You should be ashamed of yourself!
LANCELOT I didn't do it. They did.
ARTIE Please don't eat me.
STUDENTS Eat him! Eat him! Eat him!
SHREK I'm not here to eat him!
SHREK Time to pack up your toothbrush and jammies.
SHREK You're the new King of Far Far Away.
ARTIE What?
LANCELOT Artie a king? More like the Mayor of Loserville!
LANCELOT Burn.
ARTIE Is this for real?
SHREK Absolutely. Clean out your locker, kid. You got a kingdom to run.
ARTIE So, wait... l'm really the only heir?
SHREK The one and only.
ARTIE Give me... just a second.
ARTIE My good people...
ARTIE ...I think there's a lesson here for all of us.
ARTIE Maybe the next time you're about to dunk a kid's head in a chamber pot, you'll stop and think,
ARTIE "Hey, maybe this guy has feelings.
ARTIE Maybe I should cut him some slack.
ARTIE 'Cause maybe... just maybe...
ARTIE ...this guy's gonna turn out to be, I don't know, a king?
ARTIE And maybe his first royal decree will be to banish everyone who ever picked on him."
ARTIE That's right, I'm looking at you, jousting team!
ARTIE And Guin? Oh, Guin.
ARTIE I've always loved you.
ARTIE Good friends, it breaks my heart, but...
ARTIE ...enjoy your stay here in prison while I rule the free world baby!
SHREK Okay, let's not overdo it.
ARTIE I'm building my city, people... on rock 'n' roll!
SHREK You just overdid it.
SNOW WHITE Look at you!
SNOW WHITE You look darling.
SLEEPING BEAUTY Just precious. Look at her.
RAPUNZEL Any cravings since you got pregnant?
FIONA No. Not at all.

SNOW WHITE It's present time!
CINDERALLA Fiona, please open mine first. It's... It's the one in front.
FIONA "Congratulations on your new mess mak..." Oh, mess maker!
FIONA "Hopefully this helps. Love, Cinderella."
DORIS Look at that!
CINDERALLA It's for the poopies.
SLEEPING BEAUTY Wait... babies poop?
RAPUNZEL Everyone poops, Beauty.
PIG Fiona!
PIG We all chipped in for a little present, too.
PIG Ta-da!
GINGERBREAD MAN You know the baby's gonna love it, because I do!
FIONA Guys, that's so sweet. Thank you.
FIONA Who's this one from?
SNOW WHITE I got you the biggest one, because I love you most.
SNOW WHITE "Have one on me. Love, Snow White."
FIONA What is it?
SNOW WHITE He's a live-in babysitter.
NANNY DWARF Where's the baby?
FIONA You're too kind, Snow, but I can't accept this.
SNOW WHITE It's nothing. I have six more at home.
NANNY DWARF - What does he do? - The cleaning.
NANNY DWARF - The feeding. - The burping.
FIONA So, what are Shrek and I supposed to do?
RAPUNZEL Now you have plenty of time to work on your marriage.
SHREK Thanks, Rapunzel. What's that supposed to mean?
RAPUNZEL Come on now, Fiona. You know what happens.
SLEEPING BEAUTY You're tired all the time.
SNOW WHITE You start leting yourself go.
GINGERBREAD MAN Stretch marks.
RAPUNZEL Say goodbye to romance.
FIONA I'm sorry, but how many of you have kids?
DORIS She's right!
DORIS A baby will only strengthen the love Shrek and Fiona have.
DORIS How did Shrek react when you told him? Tell me!
FIONA When he first found out, Shrek said...
PRINCE CHARMING Onward, my new friends! To our happily ever afters!
PRINCE CHARMING Now... bombs away!
CAPTAIN HOOK Well, well, well. If it isn't Peter Pan.
MOTHER - His name's not Peter. - Shut it, Wendy.
PRINCE CHARMING Enough pillaging! To the castle!
GINGERBREAD MAN You go! Take care of the baby!
SNOW WHITE Everybody stay calm! We're all going to die!
FIONA Everyone in! Now!
PRINCE CHARMING Come on! Put some back into it!
FIONA We don't have time. Now go!
QUEEN Quickly, ladies!
GINGERBREAD MAN We'll hold them off as long as we can!
PRINCE CHARMING Where are Shrek and Fiona?
GINGERBREAD MAN The name doesn't ring a bell.
PIG No bell.
PRINCE CHARMING I suggest you freaks cooperate...
PRINCE CHARMING ...with the new King of Far Far Away!
GINGERBREAD MAN The only thing you're ever gonna be king of is King of the Stupids!
PRINCE CHARMING - Hook! - Right!
CAPTAIN HOOK Avast, ye cookie.
CAPTAIN HOOK Start talking.
MUFFIN MAN & GINGERBREAD MAN - Gingy! - Papa!
TEACHER Settle down now.
GINGERBREAD MAN On the good ship Lollipop
GINGERBREAD MAN It's a sweet trip to the candy shop
PRINCE CHARMING You!
PRINCE CHARMING You can't lie.
PRINCE CHARMING So tell me, puppet... where is Shrek?
PINOCCHIO Well... I don't know where he's not.
PRINCE CHARMING You don't know where Shrek is?
PINOCCHIO It wouldn't be inaccurate to assume...
PINOCCHIO ...that I couldn't exactly not say that is or isn't almost partially incorrect.
PRINCE CHARMING So you do know where he is!
PINOCCHIO On the contrary, I'm possibly more or less
PINOCCHIO not definitely rejecting the idea
PINOCCHIO that in no way, with any amount of uncertainty...
PRINCE CHARMING Stop it!
PINOCCHIO ...I do not know where he shouldn't probably be.
PINOCCHIO If that indeed wasn't where he isn't.
PINOCCHIO Even if he wasn't not where I knew he was, it could mean...
GINGERBREAD MAN On the good ship Lollipop
PIG Enough! Shrek went off to bring back the next heir!
PRINCE CHARMING He's bringing back the next heir?
PINOCCHIO No!
PRINCE CHARMING Hook! Get rid of this new "King".
PRINCE CHARMING But bring Shrek to me.
PRINCE CHARMING I have something special in mind for him.
PINOCCHIO He'll never fall for your tricks!
WOLF Oh, boy.
ARTIE I can't believe it. Me, a king?
ARTIE I knew I came from royalty and all, but...
ARTIE ...I figured everyone forgot about me.
SHREK Oh, no. In fact the King asked for you personally.
ARTIE Really? Wow.
ARTIE But I know it's not all fun and games.
SHREK It really is all fun and games, actually.
SHREK Sure, you have to knight a few heroes, launch a ship or two.
SHREK By the way, make sure you hit the boat just right with the bottle.
ARTIE Any idiot can hit a boat with the bottle.
SHREK Well, I've heard it's harder than it looks.
ARTIE This is going to be huge.
ARTIE Parties, princesses, castles. Princesses.
DONKEY You'll be living in the lap of luxury.
DONKEY The got the finest chefs will wait for your order.
PUSS And fortunately, you'll have the royal food tasters.
ARTIE What do they do?
PUSS Taste the food before the King eats, to make sure it's not poisoned.
ARTIE & SHREK - Poisoned? - Or too salty.
DONKEY Don't worry about it. Your bodyguards will keep you safe.
PUSS All of them willing at a moment's notice
PUSS to lay down their lives out of devotion to you.
ARTIE Really?
PUSS The whole kingdom will look to you for wisdom and guidance.
DONKEY Make sure they don't die of famine!
PUSS & DONKEY - Or plague. - Plague is bad.
PUSS The coughing, the groaning, the festering sores.
SHREK Festering sores! You are one funny kity cat.
PUSS What did I say?
SHREK We don't want Artie geting the wrong idea.
SHREK Artie?
SHIP CAPTAIN There goes my hip!
SHREK Artie! What are you doing?
ARTIE What does it look like?!
SHREK This really isn't up to you.
ARTIE I don't know anything about being king!
SHREK You'll learn on the job!
ARTIE Sorry to disapoint you, but I'm going back.
SHREK Back to what? Being a loser?
SHREK Now look what you did!
ARTIE Look what I did? Who's holding the wheel, chief?
SHREK Shrek!
SHIP CAPTAIN Land ho!
PUSS How humiliating.
SHREK Oh, nice going, Your Highness.
ARTIE Now it's "Your Highness"? What happened to "loser"?
SHREK If you think this is geting you out of anything, well it isn't.
SHREK We're heading back to Far Far Away one way or another...
SHREK ...and you're going to be a father!
ARTIE What?
DONKEY You just said "father".
SHREK King! You're going to be king!
ARTIE "You're going to be king!" Yeah, right.
Where do you think you are going?
ARTIE Far Far Away... from you!
SHREK You get back here, young man, and I mean it !
PUSS Boss? I don't think he's coming back.
PUSS Maybe it's for the best. He's not exactly king material.
DONKEY When did you plan to tell him you were supposed to be king?
SHREK Come on. Why would I do that?
SHREK Besides, he'll be ten times better at it than me.
DONKEY Then you're gonna change your tactics if you want to get anywhere with him.
SHREK You're right, Donkey.
SHREK What about this?
SHREK & DONKEY - Shrek! - Come on. It's just a joke.
SHREK Still...
SHREK Listen, Artie.
SHREK If you think this whole mad scene ain't dope, I feel you, dude.
SHREK I'm not trying to get up in your grill or raise your roof, or whatever.
SHREK But what I am screamin' is, yo...
SHREK ...check out this kazing thazing, bazaby!
SHREK If it doesn't groove, or what I'm saying
SHEK ain't straight trippin', say, "Oh, no, you didn't!
SHREK You're getting on my last nerve."
SHREK And then I'll know it's... I'll know it's wack!
ARTIE Somebody, help!
ARTIE I've been kidnapped by a monster who's trying to relate to me!
SHREK & ARTIE - Artie, wait. - Come on! Help! Hello?
